short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A clean and fast new tab page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stratus is a clean and fast add-on that replaces your new tab page that will display the current Gregorian and Nepalese lunar dates. It also offers a new background image everyday, a weather forecast for two days and an inspiring quote that changes daily.
